name: Deity's Form Pre-Alpha Prototype
description:
The Pre-Alpha Prototype for our game: Deity's Form. This is to show the core-gameplay in its earliest form.

Transform into your various forms to counter the enemy types that come in waves that throw themselves upon the pyre of your fury just to slow you escape. While you are powerful, their coordinated attacks can still harm you in your weakened state. Slay as many of the wave as possible before they can strike!

Controls:
Movement - W, A, S, D
Attacking - Up, Down, Left, Right
Switch Forms - Q, E or 1, 2, 3

Should you wish to give us some anonymous feedback on the current state of the game, we have a form below!

https://forms.gle/PnXADM8RpbRN7hZ4A
